#!/bin/sh retv=0 err_p="" zypper -n --gpg-auto-import-keys ref zypper_retv=$? retv=$((retv + zypper_retv)) for hamsta_rpm in qa_hamsta qa_hamsta-cmdline qa_hamsta-common qa_tools qa_lib_perl qa_lib_ctcs2 qa_lib_config qa_lib_keys do zypper -n in -l $hamsta_rpm zypper_retv=$? if [ $zypper_retv -ne 0 ];then err_p="$err_p $hamsta_rpm" echo "$hamsta_rpm update failed with return value $zypper_retv" fi retv=$((retv + zypper_retv)) done
if [ $retv -ne 0 ];then echo "Package :$err_p update failed" exit $retv else shutdown -r +1& exit 0 fi
